layout.name: shouldStartActive
layout.title: Start Active
layout.tooltip: If ticked, the platform will start active, otherwise a player has to stand on the platform to activate it.

layout.name: width
layout.title: Width
layout.tooltip: The width of the platform (in blocks).

layout.name: pleaseDontDespawn
layout.title: Don't Despawn
layout.tooltip: If ticked, the platform won't be able to despawn when it is offscreen.

layout.name: vanishOnTerminus
layout.title: Vanish on Terminus Collision
layout.tooltip: If ticked, the platform will begin to vanish after hitting a terminus.

layout.name: vanishTime
layout.title: Vanish Time
layout.tooltip: The time it takes for a platform to vanish, after hitting a terminus.

layout.name: movement
layout.title: Movement Type
layout.tooltip: The movement pattern used by the platform.

children.name: straight_h_speed
children.title: Speed
children.tooltip: The speed that the platform moves at (in pixels per frame).

children.name: straight_v_speed
children.title: Speed
children.tooltip: The speed that the platform moves at (in pixels per frame).

children.name: straight_h_speed
children.title: Horizontal Speed
children.tooltip: The speed that the platform moves horizontally at (in pixels per frame).

children.name: straight_v_speed
children.title: Vertical Speed
children.tooltip: The speed that the platform moves vertically at (in pixels per frame).

children.name: turn_h_distance
children.title: Distance
children.tooltip: The maximum distance it can move (in pixels).

children.name: turn_h_time
children.title: Time
children.tooltip: The time it takes for one complete cycle of movement (in frames).

children.name: turn_v_distance
children.title: Distance
children.tooltip: The maximum distance it can move (in pixels).

children.name: turn_v_time
children.title: Time
children.tooltip: The time it takes for one complete cycle of movement (in frames).

children.name: turn_h_distance
children.title: Horizontal Distance
children.tooltip: The maximum distance it can horizontally move (in pixels).

children.name: turn_h_time
children.title: Time (Horizontal)
children.tooltip: The time it takes for one complete cycle of horizontal movement (in frames).

children.name: turn_v_distance
children.title: Vertical Distance
children.tooltip: The maximum distance it can vertically move (in pixels).

children.name: turn_v_time
children.title: Time (Vertical)
children.tooltip: The time it takes for one complete cycle of vertical movement (in frames).

children.name: redirectorSpeed
children.title: Speed
children.tooltip: The speed that the platform moves at.

layout.name: fallWhenStoodOn
layout.title: Fall When Stood On
layout.tooltip: If ticked, the platform will fall when a player stands on it.

layout.name: fallOnTerminus
layout.title: Fall On Terminus Collision
layout.tooltip: If ticked, the platform will fall after hitting a terminus.

layout.name: dontFallIfNothing
layout.title: Only Fall When A Player Is Standing On It
layout.tooltip: If ticked, the platform will only fall if a player is standing on it. This won't do anything if Fall On Terminus Collision is ticked.

layout.name: fallDelay
layout.title: Fall Delay
layout.tooltip: The delay between the player standing on the platform and the platform actually falling.

layout.name: delaySpeed
layout.title: Falling Speed (Delayed)
layout.tooltip: The falling speed of the platform when it is delayed.

layout.name: fallMaxSpeed
layout.title: Falling Speed
layout.tooltip: The falling speed of the platform.

layout.name: fallAccel
layout.title: Falling Acceleration
layout.tooltip: The acceleration of the platform when it is falling.
